ACTION BASEBALL LEAGUE
ALL TRANSACTIONS
12/31/1978
BNN Index | ABL | SCORES | STANDINGS | STATS | TEAMS | PLAYERS | TRANSACTIONS | HISTORY
 
Sunday, December 31st , 1978
Dallas Rustlers: Signed free agent LF A.J. Wells to a minor league contract.
Portland Lumberjacks: Signed free agent 1B Adam Robinson to a minor league contract.
Detroit Dukes: Signed free agent SP Brett Helvie to a 3-year contract worth a total of $1,620,000.
Saturday, December 30th , 1978
Denver Rocketeers: Signed free agent SP John Jury to a 1-year contract worth a total of $560,000.
Phoenix Firebirds: Signed free agent SP Matt Carpenter to a 2-year contract worth a total of $1,370,000.
Friday, December 29th , 1978
